DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the degree of beta-cell dysfunction among participants with type 2 diabetes and the association between beta-cell dysfunction and demographic, clinical, and treatment variables.
DOC.brief_title: Beta-Cell Dysfunction and Insulin Resistance Among Italian Patients With Type 2 Diabetes (MK-0000-113)
